Title: Posto
Actors: Arghya Basu Roy, Soumitra Chatterjee, Jishu Sengupta, Mimi Chakraborty
Plot: This film to be a family drama based on the theme of parenting. The film revolves around the upbringing of a young boy by his grandparents and his working parents and also deals with the legal fight over parenting as the plot unfolds.
